Settings:

nn = 25

# Load dependencies and source data

```{r load_data, message=FALSE}

library(Matrix)
library(scran)
library(BiocParallel)
library(BiocNeighbors)
ncores = 5
mcparam = MulticoreParam(workers = ncores)
register(mcparam)
library(igraph)
library(reshape2)
library(knitr)
library(scater)
library(scales)
library(biomaRt)
library(batchelor)
library(irlba)
library(batchelor)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)

#root.dir = "/Users/alsu/Develop/spatial/mouse_embryo/"
root.dir = "/nfs/research1/marioni/alsu/spatial/mouse_embryo/"
source(paste0(root.dir, "amScripts_mouseEmbryoFISH/core_functions.R"))

load_embryo_8.5(dir = "cluster")
#load_embryo_8.5(dir = "local")
sce.seq = sce[!rownames(sce) == "Xist", ]

# load atlas 
sce.atlas = readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "data/reducedAtlas/E8_25__E8_5.rds"))
sce.atlas = sce.atlas[rownames(sce.seq), sce.atlas$stage == "E8.5"]
counts.atlas = logcounts(sce.atlas)

# order seq and atlas (in case, cant hurt, had troubles b4)
sce.seq = sce.seq[order(rownames(sce.seq)),]
sce.atlas = sce.atlas[order(rownames(sce.atlas)),]

# load mapping
mapping = readRDS(paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/mapping_seq2atlas_embryo2z2.rds"))
sce.seq = sce.seq[, colnames(sce.seq) %in% colnames(mapping)]
counts.seq = assay(sce.seq, "logcounts_area")
meta = data.frame( colData(sce.seq))
meta.CT = readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "data/8_5/source/E8.5_treeMNN_denoised.Rds"))
colnames(meta.CT)[colnames(meta.CT) == "cell"] <- "uniqueID"
meta = merge(meta, meta.CT, all.x = T, all.y = F)


# neigh.net
neigh.net = readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "data/8_5/source/E8.5_neighbourGraph_1.3.Rds"))

```


# Get performance stat:

1) mean-seq

2) mean-seq-1

3) mean-seq-2

4) mean-imputed 

5) mean-imputed-denoised-1

6) mean-imputed-denoised-2

```{r imputed-stat, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

mapping = mapping[, order(colnames(mapping))]
counts.seq = counts.seq[, order(colnames(counts.seq))]
genes = rownames(sce.seq)

# counts-imputed
counts.imputed = bplapply(genes, function(current.gene){
  current.atlas = counts.atlas[rownames(counts.atlas) == current.gene,]
  current.seq = counts.seq[rownames(counts.seq) == current.gene,]
  current.mapping = mapping[grepl(current.gene, rownames(mapping)),]
  mean.imputed = sapply(1:ncol(current.mapping), function(x){
    return( mean( current.atlas[current.mapping[,x]], na.rm = T) )
  })
  return(mean.imputed)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
counts.imputed = do.call(rbind, counts.imputed)
rownames(counts.imputed) = genes

# de-noise seq
denoised.seq.nn_1.mean = denoisingCounts(counts.seq, meta, neigh.net, 1, "mean", mcparam)
denoised.seq.nn_1.median = denoisingCounts(counts.seq, meta, neigh.net, 1, "median", mcparam)
denoised.seq.nn_2.mean = denoisingCounts(counts.seq, meta, neigh.net, 2, "mean", mcparam)
denoised.seq.nn_2.median = denoisingCounts(counts.seq, meta, neigh.net, 2, "median", mcparam)


# de-noise seq
denoised.imputed.nn_1.mean = denoisingCounts(counts.imputed, meta, neigh.net, 1, "mean", mcparam)
denoised.imputed.nn_1.median = denoisingCounts(counts.imputed, meta, neigh.net, 1, "median", mcparam)
denoised.imputed.nn_2.mean = denoisingCounts(counts.imputed, meta, neigh.net, 2, "mean", mcparam)
denoised.imputed.nn_2.median = denoisingCounts(counts.imputed, meta, neigh.net, 2, "median", mcparam)

# combine together
performance.seq = list(counts.seq = counts.seq,
                       counts.imputed = counts.imputed,
                       denoised.seq.nn_1.mean = denoised.seq.nn_1.mean,
                       denoised.seq.nn_1.median = denoised.seq.nn_1.median,
                       denoised.seq.nn_2.mean = denoised.seq.nn_2.mean,
                       denoised.seq.nn_2.median = denoised.seq.nn_2.median,
                       denoised.imputed.nn_1.mean = denoised.imputed.nn_1.mean,
                       denoised.imputed.nn_1.median = denoised.imputed.nn_1.median,
                       denoised.imputed.nn_2.mean = denoised.imputed.nn_2.mean,
                       denoised.imputed.nn_2.median = denoised.imputed.nn_2.median
                       )

saveRDS(performance.seq, file =  paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/performance_seq2atlas_embryo2z2.rds"))

```
